attributes.action: Have The Cadet Forces In All UK Schools
attributes.additional_details: The Cadet Forces are voluntary youth organisations that provide challenging and enjoyable activities for young people.The Cadets prepare them for their role in ther communities and If it was in every UK School it would bring back disaplin to schools and give young people something to do to keep them off the streets at nights and weekends giving somthing back to ther community and  work towards a range of qualifications based on their achievements. Some of these qualifications equate to 4 GCSEs at A*- C level (Standard grades at levels 1-3 in Scotland).and can help with future education and careers.
